body.title: Download OpenObserve
body.description: Get started with OpenObserve's powerful observability platform. Choose the deployment option that best fits your needs.

body.title: Get Started with OpenObserve
body.description: Choose the deployment option that best fits your needs and start monitoring your applications today.

tabs.label: Cloud
tabs.title: OpenObserve Clouds
tabs.description: Get started in minutes with our fully managed cloud solution. No infrastructure to manage.
features: Scalable resources based on your needs

tabs.label: Seld Hosted
tabs.title: OpenObserve Self-hosted
tabs.description: Deploy and manage OpenObserve on your own infrastructure for full control and customization.
features: Full control over your data and environment
Flexibility to configure to your specific requirements
Option to integrate with your existing systems
